about_the_game:
The boffins down at the Exploding Kittens® Emporium have made an incredible discovery.

It turns out, if you add kitty chaos to meowing mayhem, you get CAT-ASTROPHIC CARNAGE. (Side effects include dreadful feline-based puns. Bear with us.)

Now you too can experience ungodly levels of pandemonium with the Explosive Expansions Pass! This epic pass grants Exploding Kittens® 2 Superfans access to three huge expansions. Layer even more havoc upon the bedlam already available in the base game – why yes, we ARE running out of synonyms for “chaos” at this stage!

Imploding Kittens Expansion:
The Imploding Kittens expansion introduces a new level of strategy and peril to the game:
Imploding Kitten Card: Unlike the Exploding Kittens, this card doesn’t eliminate you immediately. Instead, it’s placed back into the deck face up, creating a ticking time bomb that all players must avoid. When drawn again, it causes instant elimination.
New Card Types: Discover new strategies with cards like ‘Reverse’, which changes the direction of play, and ‘Alter the Future’, allowing players to peek at and rearrange the top three cards of the deck.

Streaking Kittens:
This is the second expansion of Exploding Kittens. It includes 15 new cards including the Streaking Kitten card, which allows players to secretly hold an Exploding Kitten in their hand without exploding. Those stealing, beware!

Barking Kittens:
This is the third expansion of Exploding Kittens. It introduces 20 new cards including a pair of Barking Kitten cards that work like a game of chicken. If you have one of these cards and you think someone else has the other one, play it quickly and see if they explode. But if you’re wrong, you risk becoming a target!

INCLUDES:
IMPLODING KITTENS EXPANSION: Adds new cards, mechanics and increases the player limit
BARKING AND STREAKING EXPANSIONS – Coming January 2025 and June 2025
Get ready for CAT-ASTROPHIC CARNAGE with the Explosive Expansions Pass today!

name: Exploding Kittens® 2: Explosive Expansions Pass

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Exploding Kittens 2: Explosive Expansions Pass - $24.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Exploding Kittens® 2: Explosive Expansions Pass

short_description: One pass, three major expansions! Become a lion among kittens with the Explosive Expansions Pass. You’ll get instant access to Imploding Kittens, then two further expansions the moment they launch. Kitties and cards – what more could you want?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
